Room.Name: Grassy Knoll
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a grassy knoll, north of Galgorie Copse. East is Galgorie Pond.
Room.LongDescription: This is often the resting place for riders of the copper dragons. From here, you are within walking distance of Prince Ragnar's castle. This spot is also a favorite for the dragons too, as they like to roll in the grass and wildflowers. There is a quiet pond to the east, and a wooded copse to the south. A copper dragon waits to be mounted.
